description: OrbView-2 (formerly SeaStar) is an imaging satellite, developed, owned, managed and operated by Orbital Imaging Corporation (OrbImage) of Dulles, VA. The overall objective of the OrbView-2/SeaWiFS mission is to provide quantitative data on global ocean bio-optical properties to the Earth science community. The OrbView-2 satellite includes the SeaWiFS (Sea-Viewing Wide Field-of-View Sensor) imaging system, an 8-band multispectral imaging instrument with a one kilometer spatial resolution. The mission was renamed to "OrbView-2" from "SeaStar" in 1997.
title: OrbView-2
